Package util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdministrationFilter
    The filter to check for administrator status en route to the administration page
    ConnectionPool
    This class returns and frees connections to the database.
    DatabaseUtil
    This class closes database objects
    EmailUtil
    Sends email messages for the registry
    HashAndSaltUtil
    This class performs functions for hashing and salting.
    HeadersFilter
    Clears the browser cache
    ReferencesUtil
    Web application life cycle listener.
    SessionObjectUtil
    Resets session objects to their default values
    StringUtil
    Performs pattern matching and various other functions on strings required by the application
    UserFilter
    The filter to check for authorized users en route to restricted web pages
